    G

    GameController - Class in com.comp2042
    The GameController class handles the game logic for Tetris, including user input, brick movement, collision checking, ghost piece calculation, scoring, and updating the GUI.
    GameController(GuiController) - Constructor for class com.comp2042.GameController
    Constructs a GameController with a specified GUI controller.
    gameOver() - Method in class com.comp2042.GuiController
    Stops all timelines, shows the game over screen, and marks the game as finished.
    GameOverPanel - Class in com.comp2042
    GameOverPanel represents the UI panel displayed when the game ends.
    GameOverPanel() - Constructor for class com.comp2042.GameOverPanel
    Constructs a GameOverPanel with a centered "GAME OVER" label.
    getBoardMatrix() - Method in interface com.comp2042.Board
    Returns the internal board grid containing all placed bricks.
